!Separated Soul: You should collect *3 types of essense from bosses of Dragons*: Drake Lord's Essence, Behemoth Leader's Essence, Dragon Beast's Essence. You can obtain it by hunting down 3 monsters: *Drake Lord, Behemoth Leader, Dragon Beast*. So, that works for you? [Quest _456_DontKnowDontCare sepsoul_q456_05.htm|"I'm ready."]
